record.title: PRIVILEGES OF THE FLOOR
record.narrative:
PRIVILEGES OF THE FLOOR -- (Senate - June 02, 2008)

[Page: S4895]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, on behalf of Senator Lieberman, I ask unanimous consent that Alexander Barron, Ellen Cohen, and Sherry Gillespie, congressional fellows in his office, be granted the privileges of the floor for the duration of the debate on S. 3036. I also ask unanimous consent, on behalf of Senator Pryor, that Suzanne McGuire, a fellow in his office, be granted the privileges of the floor for the duration of debate on S. 3036. Further, I ask unanimous consent that Rachel Radell, a fellow in the office of Senator Feinstein, be granted the privileges of the floor for the duration of debate on this bill.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.

speaking.paragraph: I ask unanimous consent that T. J. Kim, a fellow with my committee office, be granted the privileges of the floor for the remainder of debate.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, on behalf of Senator Nelson of Florida, I ask unanimous consent that Maria Honeycutt be granted floor privileges for the duration of the Senate's consideration of this legislation.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, on behalf of Senator Carper, I ask unanimous consent that Khesha Jennings, a legislative fellow in his office, be allowed privileges of the floor during the climate change debate.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that Javier Gamboa, an intern with the EPW Committee, be allowed privileges of the floor for the duration of the debate on S. 3036.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
